name: He SiYuan
wishText: I Prepared a littlt Gifts for You!)
textInChatBox: I Hope You Happy Every Day!May Many Many Happy be With You...
text2: It's also the 69th day Since we've known each other.
text3: It's Fantastic to get along with you every moment.
text4: I realize, I must do something
outroText: Hope We Can Always be this So Sweet!
